description: Create a new contact. Accepts CreateContactInput with first_name, last_name, company_uuid, email, title, departments, mobile_phone, email_status, seniority, status, text_search (all optional). Uses ConnectraClient to create contact via Connectra service. Returns Contact with id, firstName, lastName, email, jobTitle, company. Requires authentication. Activity logged (non-blocking). Raises BadRequestError/ValidationError on invalid input.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateContact($input: CreateContactInput!) { contacts { createContact(input: $input) { id firstName lastName email jobTitle company { id name } } } }
